pullRequest.body:
This change was discussed in the reviews of #21831.

The `Fintype` instances on `Additive` and `Multiplicative` are now found in `Algebra.Group.TypeTags.Finite`, alongside the existing `Finite` and `Infinite` instances. This leaves behind a file containing only a `DecidableEq` instance on `AddEquiv`/`MulEquiv` (which seems not to be used in Mathlib), so I moved the file to `Algebra.Group.Equiv.Finite`. I couldn't find an obvious place to put this instance: there seem to be few low-level group theory files that import finiteness.

---

- [ ] depends on: #21831

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> List.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

Import changes exceeding 2%

| %      | File |
| -      | -    |
| +162.18% | `Mathlib.Algebra.Group.TypeTags.Finite` |

<details><summary>

#### Import changes for modified files

</summary>

Dependency changes

| File | Base Count | Head Count | Change |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mathlib.Algebra.Group.TypeTags.Finite | 156 | 409 | +253 (+162.18%) |
| Mathlib.Algebra.Divisibility.Finite | 418 | 385 | -33 (-7.89%) |
| Mathlib.Data.Fintype.Quotient | 461 | 435 | -26 (-5.64%) |
| Mathlib.GroupTheory.FreeGroup.Reduce | 481 | 467 | -14 (-2.91%) |
| Mathlib.Data.Fin.Fin2 | 415 | 403 | -12 (-2.89%) |
| Mathlib.Control.EquivFunctor.Instances | 415 | 404 | -11 (-2.65%) |
| Mathlib.Data.Finset.Piecewise | 416 | 405 | -11 (-2.64%) |
| Mathlib.Data.Fintype.Sigma | 489 | 485 | -4 (-0.82%) |
| Mathlib.Data.Fintype.Basic | 414 | 411 | -3 (-0.72%) |
| Mathlib.Algebra.BigOperators.Group.Finset.Defs | 459 | 457 | -2 (-0.44%) |
| Mathlib.Computability.PostTuringMachine | 493 | 491 | -2 (-0.41%) |
| Mathlib.Data.Fintype.List | 496 | 495 | -1 (-0.20%) |


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
There are 4024 files with changed transitive imports taking up over 176285 characters: this is too many to display!
You can run `scripts/import_trans_difference.sh all` locally to see the whole output.

</details>

</details>

---

#### Declarations diff

No declarations were harmed in the making of this PR! üêô
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

---

<details><summary>No changes to technical debt.</summary>

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>

That's a large bump in `Mathlib.Algebra.Group.TypeTags.Finite`, but not unexpected since it is merging a light file importing only `Finite` and a heavy file importing `Finset` and all that that implies.

This PR/issue depends on:
* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#21831~~
By **[Dependent Issues](https://github.com/z0al/dependent-issues)** (ü§ñ). Happy coding!
<!-- By Dependent Issues (Action) - DO NOT REMOVE -->

pullRequest.title: chore(Algebra/Group): move `Fintype` instances to `TypeTags/Finite.lean`
